title: Cooldown reduction over 40%
body:
Hello!


Today I've been playing a little and noticed something weird. I got 45% cooldown reduction while playing Lee Sin while the maximum is 40%. It got a little weird so I took a screenshot to show you. It can also be seen in replay of the game I played 13.12.2015, at 11:00 UTC +2, Jungle. Link: http://matchhistory.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUN1/1301808427/33777564

Just noticed this small bug and wanted to show you. Don't know if it's a bug tough.


Cheers,
Kajciochisko

replies.body: That is because the mastery tree you used gives you 5% at level one plus 5% over the cap allowing you a max of 45%

45% CDR is working as intended for the new season. :]
Wouldn't hurt to change the tooltip so people like OP don't get confused.
It specifically states that the mastery raises the Cooldown Cap, it's not a bug.
No. It literally is a mastery from the cunning tree which gives you 5% cdr and the ability to go beyond 40 by 5%

maybe you mean that you think they should correct the tooltip so that it says "you can have up to 45% CDR" instead of 40% when you get that mastery?
Otherwise, if you simply think that having 45% CDR while having a mastery that lets you do just that... i don't really know what to tell you...
